128.heading: Married Women.

128.author: [No author]
notes: "All I asked was the right of every married woman, to have the husband I adored at my side, always! And I fought for him with all the strength of my hungry soul! Was I wrong? Was happiness ruled out for me? Should I have resigned myself to a life of empty heartbreak the day I Married a Sailor?"
